name: Forest Fire (Duckigi)
description:
Info

This is a platformer, it is not my favorite game I have ever game, and it certainly has bugs and doesn't look great, thanks for playing though.  I released the project never intending to do anything else, but a new platformer will be out soon probably around 7/25 (not exact, may be earlier may be later, may be updated). Thanks.

How to Play

WASD or <> to move, space bar to jump, game does not work with controllers, keyboard for all movement.  In hard extras you have to get both balls to the other side, it is not impossible, I have done it before.

Credits

I used Mystical Forest assets from the unity asset store, made by Duckigi games, used pre existing payed assets.
